paragraph: At Bryhel, our team of well-qualified chemists can provide you with more than hundreds existing formulas for private label manufacturing.
Do you need a parabens-free, sodium-free, alcohol-free product or a specific texture, scent, or color? Just let us know!
If our products do not meet your need, and if you have certain specifications or need an exclusive product, we can develop a custom formula to precisely satisfy your requirements.
Ready to submit a product development request ?
